useBrowserContext_description.message: If this option is enabled, the add-on will prevent MathJax from overriding the browser context menu.

disableMathJaxZoom_description.message: If this option is enabled, the add-on will prevent MathJax from triggering zoom of mathematical formulas.

disableMathJaxMML2jax_description.message: If this option is enabled, the add-on will prevent MathJax from preprocessing any MathML elements in the page.

fixMathJaxNativeMML_description.message: If this option is enabled, the add-on will fix some rendering and performance bugs MathJax in its Native MathML module.

exclusionList_exclusionList.message: A list of URL patterns, separated by commas, indicating Web pages that the add-on should ignore. This option requires a restart to be taken into account.
